children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-k8s/0 [idle] active: Primary
  mysql-router-k8s/0 [idle] unknown:

test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.219.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.219.8          
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.39   no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.219.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.219.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.219.10         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.219.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.219.8          
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f9e51d1b820>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f9e51d1b820> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f9e51bb23e0>.model
